title: The Chrysler Building is for sale — again
author: Alexander Walter
byline: By Alexander Walter Jun 3, '25 7:27 PM EST
excerpt: Looking to splurge on some iconic real estate this summer? The Chrysler Building is on the market again after changing owners back in 2019 for a mere $150 million (down significantly from its previous 2008 sale when the price tag still reached $800 million). It's not all shiny and Art Deco...
